attributes.action: Increase the amount per mile allowed by the Inland Revenue (currently 40p) before an Income Tax liability is incurred..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of using a private motor car for business purposes has increased dramatically over recent years but still the Inland Revenue only allows an employer to pay expenses at 40p per mile above which an Income Tax liability is incurred. It is time that this figure was increased.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the amount per mile allowed by the Inland Revenue (currently 40p) before an Income Tax liability is incurred."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17632
